start room.description: You know you entered the mansion by this room, but you don't seem to see an exit to the outside.

deck.description:
You emerge into an orchard. Dark fruit drip invitingly from the trees.
Will you grab one?

repeated effects.result: As you reach to grab a fruit, its dark flesh morphs into fingers and grabs you back.

deck.description:
As you look into a mirror, another face emerges behind you.
It offers you a deal.

You enter a room filled with shelves of dolls.
One looks like another player, accompanied by a set of pins. 
You try a few.

As you enter the dining hall, an ghostly banquet appears before you. 
Your mouth waters, and you can't help but gorge yourself on the delicious meal.
